duties_responsibilities.duty: Works on multiple trials across multiple Therapeutic Areas.
Demonstrated leadership, involvement in specific initiatives and/or coaching junior flex team.
Acts as Lead SM-training other SMs on study.
Develops site start up documents for studies including SIV agenda.
Represents LTMs or SMs on SMTs/meetings.
Supports country budget development and/or contract negotiation.
Assists with ASVMetrics/KPIs and interfaces with primary and other stakeholders.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Biological Sciences or equivalent (Master's preferred)
Minimum 3 years' experience in monitoring pharmaceutical industry clinical trials
